slayTheMiko:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
slayTheMiko:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

slayTheMiko:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
slayTheMiko:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
slayTheMiko:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

slayTheMiko:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
slayTheMiko:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

slayTheMiko:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
slayTheMiko:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !slayTheMiko:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

slayTheMiko:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
slayTheMiko:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !slayTheMiko:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
